thread.section_title: citizenM New York Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great central location
thread.title_full: Great central location - Review of citizenM New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: David M
title: Great central location
text: Just returned home today after 5 days in Citizenm. Hotel had thought of everything, U.K./US plug, all toiletries at hand. Really minimal room which had everything in it. Shower cubical great size. Great location, food bar, restaurants and access to subway on the doorstep. Definitely recommend to first time visitors to nyc. We will be back very soon.
